trans-unit.source: Specifies the editor to use to change a property.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的属性进行更改的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: When editing the property, a visual designer should create a new instance of the specified editor through a dialog box or drop-down window.
trans-unit.target: 当编辑属性时，可视化设计器中应创建指定编辑器对话框中或下拉窗口中的新的实例。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute.EditorBaseTypeName%2A> property to find this editor's base type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute.EditorBaseTypeName%2A>属性来查找此编辑器的基类型。</xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute.EditorBaseTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The only available base type is <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>.
trans-unit.target: 唯一可用的基类型是<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute.EditorTypeName%2A> property to get the name of the type of editor associated with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute.EditorTypeName%2A>属性获取与此属性关联的编辑器的类型的名称。</xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute.EditorTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For general information on using attributes.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的一般信息。

trans-unit.source: see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on design-time attributes, see [Attributes and Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 设计时特性的详细信息，请参阅[特性和设计时支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> class with the default editor, which is no editor.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>使用默认编辑器，这是没有编辑器的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> class with the type name and base type name of the editor.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>类的类型名称和的编辑器基类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The `typeName` parameter must be in the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> format.
trans-unit.target: `typeName`参数必须采用<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>格式。</xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> represented by the `typeName` parameter must either derive from or implement the base class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>由`typeName`参数必须派生自或实现基的类。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> represented by the `baseTypeName` parameter is used as a key to find a particular editor, because a data type can have more than one editor associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>由`baseTypeName`参数用于作为键查找特定的编辑器，因为数据类型可以有多个与其关联的编辑器</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This can be any class, but is typically <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是任何类，但通常是<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name of the editor.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器的完全限定的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name of the base class or interface to use as a lookup key for the editor.
trans-unit.target: 基类或接口将用作查找键编辑器的完全限定的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: This class must be or derive from <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此类必须是或派生自<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> class with the type name and the base type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>具有类型名称和基类型的类。

trans-unit.source: The `typeName` parameter must be in the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> format.
trans-unit.target: `typeName`参数必须采用<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>格式。</xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> represented by the `typeName` must either derive from or implement the base class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>由`typeName`必须派生自或实现基的类。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The `baseType` parameter is used as a key to find a particular editor, because a data type can have more than one editor associated with it.
trans-unit.target: `baseType`参数用于作为键查找特定的编辑器，因为数据类型可以有多个与之关联的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name of the editor.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器的完全限定的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the base class or interface to use as a lookup key for the editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的基类或接口使用编辑器作为查找键。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This class must be or derive from <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此类必须是或派生自<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> class with the type and the base type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>类的类型和基类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> represented by the `type` parameter must either derive from or implement the base class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>由`type`参数必须派生自或实现基的类。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The `baseType` parameter is used as a key to find a particular editor, because a data type can have more than one editor associated with it.
trans-unit.target: `baseType`参数用于作为键查找特定的编辑器，因为数据类型可以有多个与之关联的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of the editor.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示类型的编辑器。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the base class or interface to use as a lookup key for the editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的基类或接口使用编辑器作为查找键。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This class must be or derive from <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此类必须是或派生自<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the base class or interface serving as a lookup key for this editor.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为此编辑器查找键的接口的基类的名称。

trans-unit.source: The EditorBaseTypeName property is an assembly qualified type name.
trans-unit.target: EditorBaseTypeName 属性是程序集限定的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] provides both <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor> as valid base classes, but any value is valid here.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]提供<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor>为有效的基类，但任何值都是有效。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentEditor> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>

trans-unit.source: The name of the base class or interface serving as a lookup key for this editor.
trans-unit.target: 基类或接口作为此编辑器查找键名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the editor class in the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> format.
trans-unit.target: 获取名称中的编辑器类<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>格式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the editor class in the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> format.
trans-unit.target: 中的编辑器类的名称<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定对象的值是否等于当前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object to test the value equality of.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的值相等性的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果给定的对象的值是否等于当前对象;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique ID for this attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 获取此特性类型的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: The TypeId property is used by filtering algorithms to identify two attributes that are the same type.
trans-unit.target: TypeId 属性通过筛选算法用于标识具有相同的类型的两个特性。

trans-unit.source: For most attributes, this just returns the <xref:System.Type> instance for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数属性，这只返回<xref:System.Type>属性的实例。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> overrides this to include the type of the editor base type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>重写此特性以包含编辑器基类型的类型。</xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A unique ID for this attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 此特性类型唯一 ID。
